name: Fluidly solved
description:
Controls:

  • Click the objects to make them move or do something
  • R to restart
  • M to go to the Main Menu
  • Enter to select

Fluidly solved is a puzzle game in which you have to fill a cube with water, but moving objects and using other things to make the water to go there.
